title: I am in android 11. Is there way to only set messages from my contacts to show up as conversations ?
content:
In android 11 , the main issue with the conversation section is it is showing all the messages as conversations in notification.
Because if this all spam and promotion messages are all categorised under conversations and creates a mess.

The OS should be smart enough by only showing messages from my contacts in conversations.

Google please fix this issue or else there is no use in introducing this feature.
